title: Lost an ARAM reroll after someone dodged
body: I dont really care that much because its just a reroll point but i'm sure this is a new bug as I know this hasnt happened before (you always get the point back after someone dodges) so yeah.. I also have it on video for proof

replies.body: I have the same problem, every game that someone dodges i lose my rerolls, i play a lot of aram with a group of friends and we all have every champion, so we reroll for each other and then swap back, but if we trade and someone dodges (not in our group) recently we've been losing our rerolls as well.

Hey there,

That definitely sounds odd, if someone dodges during champ select you shouldn't lose a reroll.

It's possible it may be just a visual bug, was your reroll there after a client restart? If not you'll have to [contact Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) regarding this issue as we here on the boards cannot assist with account specific inquiries.
No it wasn't, I definitely lost a reroll point, because in my next champion select I only had 1 reroll
As I said, you'll have to contact Player Support regarding this issue.
